document_data.mainbody: arssonThe only other Halruaan Darsson used the name as a self-given patronym, after his father Dars. No information is given as to whether this Darsson is using his name as a patronym as well, or if there is any relationship to Darsson Spellmaker. was the captain of the Halruaan skyship Stormsailer owned by the Datharathi as of . He himself was a native of Halruaa, and a wizard of enough experience to control the skyship. He took Warian Datharathi, Sevaera Datharathi and Zeltaebar Datharathi across the Golden Water on that year.
